profile:
Voted Best Home Inspection Company in Toronto by Home Stars!

Best Of HomeStars! - 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019!

If you are looking for a reliable and qualified home inspection company with the best services in the Toronto area, only trust the experts at Allmax. Here at Allmax Home Inspections we are the trusted source for home buyers in the area, and we make sure our clients make informed decisions before making the biggest purchase of their lives. Visit: http://allmaxhomes.ca for pricing information. Our team of expert inspectors will be able to see what the other guys can't! We are trained in mold detection and removal. If you are concerned your dream house might be hiding something, make sure to call the experts at Allmax and avoid a nasty surprise! Founded in 2005, AllMax Home and Property Inspections has quickly grown to be the premier inspection service for residential and business properties in the greater Toronto area. We take a customer first approach with our detailed reports and personal touch on each one of our inspections. Our company only hires experienced inspectors that have both inspector experience, as well as building experience for our residential and commercial properties. As the leader in Toronto home inspection services, we here at Allmax will continue to provide to top rated inspection services from our team of experienced inspectors. No matter if you are a first time buyer or looking for investment properties trust the experts at Allmax with your Toronto home inspection. Come see the difference a HomeStars award winning inspector can make to the purchase of your dream home and give the professionals a visit on our website at http://allmaxhomes.ca for more information.

5 Star Cleaning provides professional and licensed Water Damage Restoration Services for all of Toronto & GTA. Our team responds to projects 24/7 for immediate Water Damage Remediation to prevent secondary damage to your home! Our team is experienced, licensed, and fully equipped to deal with Water Damage issues in Homes, Condos, basements, and Commercial properties. Call us now for free phone consultation for your Water Damage Service need. Big or Small, we do them all! 416-315-7562

5 Star Cleaning Team also provides POST RENOVATION CLEANING SERVICES, MOVE IN/MOVE OUT CLEANING SERVICES, AND REGULAR HOUSE CLEANING SERVICES. Our in-house cleaning team is dedicated to providing DEEP CLEANING services around your priorities and goals for the cleaning services. Everything in the house is included in our cleaning packages, and we provide all equipment and supplies for professional house cleaning projects. Call us today for free phone consultation for all of your house cleaning needs. 416-315-7562

5 Star Cleaning, provides professional rug and carpet cleaning, Upholstery Cleaning, Scotch Guarding, and Stain Removal Services in both residential and Commercial areas in the GTA and Toronto areas. For booking call, 416 315 7562

profile:
Canada's Restoration Services is a leader in the restoration industry with over 12 years of experience. We specialize in mold removal, asbestos testing and removal, water damage restoration, fire and smoke damage and reconstruction.

We operate 24/7 and guarantee to be on site within 45 minutes for all emergencies. We provide same day appointments and have completed over 10,000 inspections and jobs nationwide. We work with every insurance company across Canada to help make the process quicker and easier for you and your family. We also provide free financing for all eligible customers to help ease any burdens.

We are a nationwide company and have been awarded over 13 years running  by HomeStars as Top Restoration Company. We value our customers and work hard to provide professional and reliable services. Call and speak to an expert today! We service Ontario, Quebec, and Alberta!
service_area:
Our Certified Experienced Water Damage Specialists and Mold Inspectors are strategically located throughout the provinces.

This enables Emergency Response within 45 minutes or less.

No time? Emergency? we are located in or serve every major city in Alberta, Ontario, Quebec. Call Now - help is close by!

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.

profile:
Asbestos Removal, Lead Removal & Mold Detection & Removal

Green Stream Environmental Inc. is one of the leading Asbestos Removal Contractors in Toronto, GTA and Ontario. Based in Toronto, we specialize in the Inspection and Remediation of Asbestos for a variety of residential, commercial and industrial property issues, both hazardous and non-hazardous.

Certified - We are certified by The Institute of Inspection, Cleaning and Restoration (IICRC) - the only certification recognized by North American adjusters in cases of ‘mould’ and ‘water damage’. Our technicians are accredited and hold the following IICRC designations:

    * WRT - Water Damage Restoration Technician
    * AST – Applied Structural Drying Technician
    * AMRT – Applied Microbial Remediation Technician

Trusted - GreenStream Environmental Inc. is fully licensed and insured, holding $2 million dollars of general liability insurance coverage, $2 million dollars of environmental pollution insurance coverage and WSIB coverage.

Also, to avoid any conflict of interest and provide you with unbiased results, we employ 3rd party testing and remediation consulting firms to verify and confirm all findings.

24/7/365 Emergency Service - Professional remediation contractors, we’re trained to deal with emergencies, able to diagnose the source of the problem, and remediate it quickly and efficiently.

Discrete – Discretion and privacy are guaranteed. We use unmarked vehicles and our technicians do not wear uniforms when visiting your property. Rest assured that your environmental issue will be handled without attracting undue attention.
service_area: Toronto, North York, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Concord, GTA, Peel Region, Halton Region, Southwest Ontario and beyond.
services: Mould Removal, Asbestos Removal, Vermiculite Removal

profile:
The Healthy Abode Inc. is your Certified Residential & Commercial Environmental Assessment Company.

We Test and Inspect for Mold, Lead, Asbestos, Bacteria, VOCs, Allergens & perform Designated Substance Surveys in accordance with O Reg. 490/09.

IICRC WRT Certified (Mold), IAC2 Certified (Indoor Air), 253W Ontario Certified (Asbestos), EPA Certified (Lead), WHMIS Certified (Hazardous Materials).  We are a proud member of BILD.

The Healthy Abode Inc. ONLY performs testing and inspections of hazards as an independent 3rd party company.  We do not perform any remediation or abatement activities and, as such, will always provide our customers with unbiased and honest results.

We provide discreet and confidential testing.

www.thehealthyabode.ca
angelina@thehealthyabode.ca
416-901-7527
service_area: We service the GTA and most of South-Western Ontario.  Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns, we're happy to help!  647-889-2254

profile:
With over 20 years experience, A & E Environmental is a leader in mold and asbestos remediation.  Our certified technicians will analyze and identify all problem areas and provide our homeowners with a detailed breakdown of how to effectively and cost efficiently get the job done without breaking the bank!
Trying to sell? let us close the deal on your attic, bathroom and basement mold problems. Home inspections can shed a new light on underlying mold and asbestos issues.  Commonly these issues are brought to the surface causing havoc to homeowners. 

Our professionals are fully insured and certified to identify various levels of mold and asbestos, therefore determining the type of procedures required to remediate, adhering to all provincial standards and guidelines.  Your safety is our priority.  Leave the worries to us! We look forward to working with you!  

** Contact us TODAY for a non chemical botanical disinfectant for your home! This treatment is approved for disinfecting COVID 19. Check out the product here: https://benefect.com/ca/products/decon-30/

Mold Solutions Canada is a company specialized in mold remediation, mold testing, air quality testing, and mold inspections. We are board certified and will work with you. 

Not only do we get rid of the mold in your home, but we give you the recommendations to prevent the mold from coming back.   From poor ventilation in your attic, to a leaking foundation, we make sure your home is fully functional so that the mold doesn't come back again. 

Fast, friendly, and fully functional, our professional Mold Company is up and coming in the GTA. Our team is up for every job, managing projects with the skill and experience our clients have come to expect. We always stand behind our work, with customer satisfaction being our #1 priority. Contact us to learn more and get experienced mold inspector out right away!

profile:
PuroClean Canada is a leader in providing complete services in mold detection & removal.  Our expertise in property damage emergencies, helps families and businesses overcome the devastating setbacks caused by water, fire, mold and other conditions resulting in property loss.

Our understanding and compassion during the recovery process has earned PuroClean the reputation of being known as “The Paramedics of Property Damage™" and a provider of choice for insurance professionals and property owners throughout Canada and the United States.  We pledge to do whatever it takes to respond, restore and rescue properties in all of the communities we serve.
service_area: Ontario & Alberta, BC Lower Mainland, BC Fraser Valley
services:
1. Water Damager Restoration:
 
Our trained professionals identify the full extent of water damage, both obvious and unseen, by using moisture sensors and detectors. This ensures that a thorough remediation and cleanup within the damaged property is always completed, no matter the size of the  water emergency project. 
 
Some examples of the water damage services handled by PuroClean are: Flooded Basements, Sump pump failure, Sewer backup, Cracks in the foundation leading to seepage and many more incidents where water has damaged your home or property. 
 
2. Fire Damage Restoration: 
 
As property owners, we understand how devastating a fire can be, which is why we take the time to walk each owner through every step of the restoration process.
 
Our main goal is to meet the needs of the customer and ensure that their mind is at ease throughout the entire process. We determine the full extent of the fire damage, including the impact of smoke, heat and residues from fire and smoke. 
 
It is essential that we provide open communication with the property owner, ensuring that they are fully aware of what will be taking place in their home following this unexpected loss. 
 
PuroClean is determined in their processes to prevent replacement costs that reduce overall expenditures, saving the property owner money wherever possible. 


3. Mould Inspection and Mitigation:
 
When it comes to a property that has been affected by Mould we use environmentally friendly cleaning agents, a botanical spray and a hydroxyl to ensure that the infected area has been completely sanitized and cleansed. 
 
Through this multifaceted process, mould spores are captured and killed, leaving behind a clean area and fresh scent. Whether your property has been affected by Attic Mould,  Mould in the Kitchen, Basement Mould or any other kind of mould in your home or property the Paramedics of Property Damage are your trusted restoration specialists. 
 
4. Biohazard & Trauma Cleanup: 
 
In your time of need, let our professional technicians take care of you and your family, providing you peace of mind. 
 
Our services will be professionally completed and your space and belongings handled with care. 
 
We offer the following Biohazard clean ups: Blood and Bodily fluid cleanup, Suicide and Homicide Cleanup, Accidental Death Clean up, Sewage Cleanup and Sanitation Services, Rodent and Bird Feces Cleanup Services and Hoarding Cleanup Services.
diplomas: IICRC Certification: ASD, WRT, FSRT, AMRT
name: Puro Clean Of Greater Toronto Area
